    Runtime Recovery of Web Applications under Zero-day ReDoS Attacks

    Published in IEEE Security&Privacy 2021, 2021

    This paper presents a novel approach for runtime recovery of web applications under zero-day ReDoS attacks, providing robust security mechanisms for web services.

    Recommended citation: Bai, Z., Wang, K., Zhu, H., Cao, Y., & Jin, X. (2021). Runtime Recovery of Web Applications under Zero-day ReDoS Attacks. IEEE Security&Privacy 2021.
